name: Demolynov
description:
Two student angry because they don't get their coffee starting destroy everything

their goal : destroy most thing than the other one.

Play with a friend to see which of you is the most turbulent student.

Make combo to win more points, choose the most powerful weapon among a knife, a stick, an axe, a katana, a mass and a golf club.

Player 1 play with ZQSD to move, C to punch and V to take a weapon

Player 2 play with IJKL to move, M to punch and P to take a weapon

(Project released on 48h, please be kind about bugs :)  )
